title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.57 - Consistency
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.57 - Consistency

State Regulations

Continued uniformity, during a period or from one period
to another, in methods of accounting and use of generally accepted accounting
principles (mainly in valuation bases and methods of accural, as reflected in
the financial statements of a business enterprise or other accounting or
economic unit). Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
451.57

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
